blogPost.excerpt: Need to clip the background out of a photo to use on an e-commerce store or web design? No problem! Just upload your images to the background remover, and our AI will handle the rest. - 1-click simplicity - High-quality image masking - Bulk processing
blogPost.body: Need to clip the background out of a photo to use on an e-commerce store or web design? No problem! Just upload your images to the background remover, and our AI will handle the rest. - 1-click simplicity - High-quality image masking - Bulk processing
blogPost.title: Background Remover - Quickly remove the background from any photo for free
blogPost.author: Ivan

localize.description: 需要剪裁出照片的背景才能在电商商店或网页设计上使用吗？没问题!只需将你的图片上传到背景去除程序，我们的人工智能就会处理睡觉。单击简单性-高质量图像掩模-批量处理
localize.tagline: 免费快速删除任何照片的背景

localize.description: 需要剪裁出照片的背景才能在電商商店或網頁設計上使用嗎？沒問題!只需將你的圖片上傳到背景去除程序，我們的人工智能就會處理睡覺。單擊簡單性-高質量圖像掩模-批量處理
localize.tagline: 免費快速刪除任何照片的背景

previous.excerpt: Fibery is a connected workspace for product teams. It unites user research, ideation, strategic planning, product roadmapping, software development and customer feedback aggregation. Escape scattered tools and make better products with Fibery.
previous.title: Fibery for Product Teams - All-in-one platform to invent, build and grow your products

localize.description: Fibery是一个产品团队的互联工作空间。它将用户研究、构思、战略规划、产品路线图、软件开发和客户反馈汇总等工作统一起来。摆脱分散的工具，用Fibery做出更好的产品。
localize.tagline: 一体化平台，让您发明、构建和发展您的产品。

localize.description: Fibery是一個產品團隊的互聯工作空間。它將用戶研究、構思、戰略規劃、產品路線圖、軟件開發和客戶反饋彙總等工作統一起來。擺脫分散的工具，用Fibery做出更好的產品。
localize.tagline: 一體化平臺，讓您發明、構建和發展您的產品。

next.excerpt: https://www.rutterapi.com helps you build 1 integration that works with Shopify, WooCommerce, and many more Ecommerce platforms. Push & pull Products, Orders, and Customers data with one set of endpoints. https://docs.rutterapi.com
next.title: Rutter - One API for every Ecommerce platform

localize.description: https://www.rutterapi.com 帮助你建立1个集成，与Shopify、WooCommerce以及更多的电商平台合作。用一组端点推拉产品、订单和客户数据。https://docs.rutterapi.com。
localize.tagline: 每个电商平台都有一个API
